results.title: A randomized controlled trial of add-on naproxen, simvastatin and their combination for the treatment of schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder.
results.text_hl: A randomized controlled trial of add-on @CHEMICAL_Naproxen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009288 @@@naproxen@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and their combination for the treatment of @DISEASE_Schizophrenia @DISEASE_MESH:D012559 @@@schizophrenia@@@ or @<m>DISEASE_Psychotic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011618 @@@schizoaffective disorder@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin augmentation for recent-onset psychotic disorder: A study protocol
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ augmentation for recent-onset @<m>DISEASE_Psychotic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011618 @@@psychotic disorder@@@: A study protocol

results.title: [Psychiatric disorders with use of simvastatin].
results.text_hl: Three @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ are described with serious @DISEASE_Mental_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@psychiatric complications@@@ related to use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. The @DISEASE_Mental_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@psychiatric symptoms@@@ concerned were mainly @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@, @DISEASE_Anxiety @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@ and suicidal tendencies but also @<m>DISEASE_Psychotic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011618 @@@psychotic symptoms@@@.

citations.NLM: Duits N, Bos FM. [Psychiatric disorders with use of simvastatin]. Ned Tijdschr Geneeskd. 1993 Jun 26;137(26):1312-5. PMID: 8345888

results.title: Ondansetron and simvastatin added to treatment as usual in patients with schizophrenia: study protocol for a randomized controlled trial
results.text_hl: This is a two center, six-month, double-blind placebo controlled, factorial design study of @CHEMICAL_Ondansetron @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017294 @@@ondansetron@@@ and/or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ added to treatment as usual for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ suffering from @DISEASE_Schizophrenia @DISEASE_MESH:D012559 @@@schizophrenia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Psychotic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011618 @@@schizoaffective disorder@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Psychotic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011618 @@@psychosis@@@ not otherwise specified or @<m>DISEASE_Psychotic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011618 @@@schizophreniform disorder@@@.

citations.NLM: Chaudhry IB, Husain N, Husain MO, Hallak J, Drake R, Kazmi A, Rahman Ru, Hamirani MM, Kiran T, Mehmood N, Stirling J, Dunn G, Deakin B. Ondansetron and simvastatin added to treatment as usual in patients with schizophrenia: study protocol for a randomized controlled trial Trials. 2013 Apr 17;14():101. PMID: 23782463
